name: Exilium
description:
Become the last beacon of sanity in this Victorian–inspired horror. As corruption of unknown origin and intent consumes the world around you, try your best to save an unfortunate soul caught in the ensuing madness. Will you restore the light? Or become consumed by the encroaching darkness.

Team:

Filip Abramovic
Milos Manojlovic
Vuk Spalajkovic
Ivana Miljkovic
Teodora Pekovic
Filip Radulovic
Marko Bibuljica
Mihajlo Tatic

Nikola Djordjevic
